titleStmt.title: An exhortation of holye Basilius Magnus to hys younge kynsemen styrynge theym to the studie of humaine lernynge that they might thereby be the more apt to attayne to the knowlege of diuine literature / translated oute of Greke into Englyshe by Wyllyam Berker.
titleStmt.author: Basil, Saint, Bishop of Caesarea, ca. 329-379.

titleStmt.title: An exhortation of holye Basilius Magnus to hys younge kynsemen styrynge theym to the studie of humaine lernynge that they might thereby be the more apt to attayne to the knowlege of diuine literature / translated oute of Greke into Englyshe by Wyllyam Berker.
titleStmt.author: Basil, Saint, Bishop of Caesarea, ca. 329-379.
Barker, William, fl. 1572.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: An homelye of Basilius Magnus.
